location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to The Honourable Mountstuart Elphinstone, President and Governor in Council, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter informing the Governor in Council of some bills of exchange drawn on the Honourable board by Lieutenant-Colonel John Macdonald on account of the Mission to Persia which had been endorsed by Colonel Stannus.
